    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:49.440

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:55.360

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:00.200

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:04.240

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.600
    | text      = One note before you watch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:12.320
    | text      = At the beginning of the interview, we asked the most obvious question, which is why did
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:15.559
    | text      = you do this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:16.559

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:19.299
    | text      = And that's your justification.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:20.639
    | text      = And the answer we got shocked us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:23.679
    | text      = Putin went on for a very long time, half an hour, about the history of Russia going back
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:29.240
    | text      = to the eighth century.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.360

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:36.320
    | text      = him several times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:37.320
    | text      = And he responded, he was annoyed by the interruption.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:41.340
    | text      = But we concluded in the end, for what it's worth, that it was not a filibustering technique.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:44.840
    | text      = There was no time limit on the interview.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:46.720
    | text      = We ended it after more than two hours.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:49.440
    | text      = Instead, what you're about to see seemed to us sincere, whether you agree with it or not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:54.240
    | text      = Vladimir Putin believes that Russia has a historic claim to parts of Western Ukraine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:00.200

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.019

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:35.840
    | text      = It is easy to find out on the internet when I was in the USA at the invitation of a Bush
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:40.880
    | text      = senior.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:42.380
    | text      = It is even easier to learn from someone I'm going to tell you about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:47.199
    | text      = I was told it was very interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:50.079
    | text      = I said, just imagine if we could tackle such a global strategic security challenge together.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:56.719
    | text      = The world will change.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:58.280
    | text      = We'll probably have disputes, probably economic and even political ones, but we could drastically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:04.500
    | text      = change the situation in the world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:07.280
    | text      = He says yes and asks, are you serious?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:11.199
    | text      = I said, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:12.199
    | text      = You for real, bro?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:13.199
    | text      = We need to think about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:14.199
    | text      = I'm sold.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:15.199
    | text      = I said, go ahead, please.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:17.840
    | text      = Then Secretary of Defense Gates, former director of CIA and Secretary of State Rice came in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:27.960
    | text      = They sat on this table.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:29.679
    | text      = Me, the foreign minister, the Russian defense minister on that side, they said to me, yes,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:37.239
    | text      = we have thought about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:38.760
    | text      = We agree.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:39.760
    | text      = I said, thank God, great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:42.400
    | text      = But with some exceptions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:44.440
    | text      = So twice you've described US presidents making decisions and then being undercut by their
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:50.860
    | text      = agency heads.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:52.800
    | text      = So it sounds like you're describing a system that's not run.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:56.159
    | text      = Like a dictatorship?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:01.599
    | text      = That's right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:02.599
    | text      = That's right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:03.599
    | text      = What man should have unilateral power?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:07.000
    | text      = I'm not going to tell you the details because I think it's incorrect.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:11.219
    | text      = After all, it was confidential conversation, but our proposal was declined.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:16.079
    | text      = That's a fact.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:17.119
    | text      = So it's been reported pretty widely going back to at least 2000 predating even Bush's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:21.800
    | text      = time in office, this joint missile defense stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:24.739
    | text      = It was also something that Putin suggested many other times, and the sticking point is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:28.480
    | text      = generally that Putin wanted a guarantee that the missile defense systems would never be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:32.440
    | text      = used against Russia's missiles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:34.800
    | text      = This has been a non-starter for obvious as well as practical reasons, like a treaty like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:39.079
    | text      = that would need to be ratified by the Senate, which would be an enormous hurdle that probably
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:43.079
    | text      = would never get cleared.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:44.320
    | text      = But you can see in that clip, there's two dynamics really at play.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:48.119
    | text      = Putin is airing out these grievances and coming off a little bit complainy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:51.519
    | text      = Meanwhile, Tucker is trying to do whatever he can to inject his business into the conversation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:56.000
    | text      = as he did there, trying to weave in a point that would bring things into this deep state-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:00.159
    | text      = Presidents suck.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:01.159
    | text      = Gotcha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:02.159
    | text      = And the deep state is secretly in control of the United States, that this is the fertile
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:06.360
    | text      = territory for Tucker.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:07.599
    | text      = The system is broken because the deep state broke it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:10.599
    | text      = Yeah, because our elected leader isn't the one who's making the decision, as you're saying
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:14.360
    | text      = unilaterally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:15.360
    | text      = It's these deep state people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:17.960
    | text      = Putin acknowledged Tucker's point, but then carried on with his own line of thought, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:21.159
    | text      = goes to show that someone who is boring and has actual power will beat someone flashy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:26.400
    | text      = who has pretend power every time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:28.360
    | text      = Every time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:32.360
    | text      = It feels like there are these moments where Tucker is trying to be like, all right, now
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:37.500
    | text      = let's play this ball.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:38.500
    | text      = Let's play this ball.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:39.500
    | text      = Come on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:40.500
    | text      = Come on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:41.500
    | text      = Something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:42.500
    | text      = Come on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:43.500
    | text      = Yeah, because the answer to that, of course, is Putin, you're a lying piece of shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:46.280
    | text      = Nobody can trust you ever and nobody can because you've proven yourself to be untrustworthy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:50.519
    | text      = Even if you're telling the truth, you can't be trusted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:54.099
    | text      = That's the end of our conversation, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:56.039
    | text      = That's the problem with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:57.039
    | text      = I don't believe a single word you say, even and especially when it's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:02.920
    | text      = Little old me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:03.920
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:04.920
    | text      = I can't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:05.920
    | text      = You have proven yourself that way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:07.380
    | text      = What is the point of this conversation other than to see how interesting your lies are?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:12.800
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:13.800
    | text      = Right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:14.800
    | text      = I guess that's sort of my look at it, my glimpse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:19.239
    | text      = So we get to the 2004 Ukrainian election and Putin has some thoughts about that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:24.320
    | text      = 2004.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:25.320
    | text      = 2004.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:26.320
    | text      = The first time he won after President Kuchma, they organized a third round, which is not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:33.119
    | text      = provided for in the Constitution of Ukraine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:36.800
    | text      = This is a coup d'etat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:38.679
    | text      = Just imagine someone in the United States wouldn't like the outcome.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:43.199
    | text      = In 2014?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:46.599
    | text      = Before that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:47.599
    | text      = No, this was before that, after President Kuchma, Viktor Yanukovych, won the elections.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:53.199
    | text      = However, his opponents did not recognize that victory.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:56.760
    | text      = The U.S. supported the opposition and the third round was scheduled.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:01.480
    | text      = What is this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:02.480
    | text      = This is a coup.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:03.840
    | text      = The U.S. supported it and the winner of the third round came to power.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:09.179
    | text      = Imagine if in the U.S. something was not to someone's liking and the third round of election,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:14.599
    | text      = which the U.S. Constitution does not provide for, was organized.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:18.239
    | text      = Nonetheless, it was done in Ukraine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:21.239
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:22.239
    | text      = So Leonid Kuchma had been president of Ukraine from 1994 to 2005 and he was a leader that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:28.400
    | text      = was oriented towards Russia, generally, he was a friendly leader.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:32.400
    | text      = There was an election to name his successor in 2004 that came down to Viktor Yanukovych
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:36.360
    | text      = and Viktor Yushchenko, which Yushchenko won.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:39.480
    | text      = That was bad for Putin, since Yushchenko was aligned towards NATO and being a part of Europe,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:44.159
    | text      = as opposed to being closer with Russia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:46.400
    | text      = Putin doesn't believe that Ukraine is a real country, but that's fine, as long as the leader
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:50.320
    | text      = of the country is not a problem for him and Yushchenko was a potential problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:55.239
    | text      = It's worth noting that when he was running for president, someone poisoned Yushchenko
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:58.239
    | text      = with dioxin in what many fully understand to be an assassination attempt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:03.280
    | text      = But as we learned on our last episode, Putin has said that they do not have a habit of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:06.059
    | text      = such things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:07.059
    | text      = They don't do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:08.059
    | text      = Putin is saying that there was an unheard of third round of voting that took place in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:11.360
    | text      = 2004 and he's kind of right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:13.480
    | text      = What happened is that there was a normal first round where someone would need to get over
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:16.560
    | text      = 50% of the vote to win.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:18.760
    | text      = No one got that much, so they went to a runoff, which is the second round, and that was just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:22.439
    | text      = between Yushchenko and Yanukovych.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:24.659
    | text      = The second round of voting was plagued by what you might call irregularities.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:29.079
    | text      = For instance, in the Donetsk Oblats, where Yanukovych is from, they reported like a 98%
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:35.399
    | text      = turnout, which is insane, and a massive jump from the first round.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:39.439
    | text      = And 97% voted for him, too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:41.920
    | text      = So crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:42.920
    | text      = Further, poll watchers from Yushchenko's side were expelled from many polling stations on
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:46.800
    | text      = the eastern side of the country, and the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe said
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:51.039
    | text      = that there were more violations of election law than they could list off in the time that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:54.880
    | text      = they had in a press conference.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:56.359
    | text      = The eastern side of Ukraine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:58.760
    | text      = Geographically, that seems closer to Russia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:01.159
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:02.560
    | text      = Public outcry led to a challenge of the results of the runoff, then that got to the Ukrainian
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:07.880
    | text      = Supreme Court, who threw out the results and ordered a new runoff, which Yushchenko would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:11.760
    | text      = go on to win.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:12.760
    | text      = So, it is true that a third round of voting did happen, but it was done according to Ukrainian
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:17.800
    | text      = law and because there were massive problems with the runoff election.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:22.319
    | text      = But it's fun to see how Putin is essentially poking at Tucker here, with the, can you imagine
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:26.560
    | text      = if someone didn't believe the results of the election in the US?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:29.600
    | text      = Tucker has probably had a rough time figuring out if he should agree or disagree with that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:33.640
    | text      = Like, how do I play this ball?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:34.640
    | text      = Am I being fucked with right now?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:36.899
    | text      = The interesting thing here is that Putin would have had no problem if Yanukovych had won
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:40.880
    | text      = that election.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:41.880
    | text      = In fact, congratulated him on the win before it was overturned because he knew that Yanukovych
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:46.560
    | text      = would be friendly to Russian interests.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:49.020
    | text      = Ukraine isn't a country to Putin, so he can't possibly care about the integrity of the voting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:52.720
    | text      = system.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:53.720
    | text      = He just cares that whoever is leading the non-country is beholden to him and not the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:57.880
    | text      = West.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:58.880
    | text      = That is so interesting because I think we're going to have an almost identical situation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:04.880
    | text      = here as, not identical.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:07.319
    | text      = I mean, a similar situation wherein essentially the Supreme Court will come down to decide
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:13.439
    | text      = the election.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:14.439
    | text      = Right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:15.439
    | text      = Like, in the situation that the Supreme Court chose-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:17.439
    | text      = It'll be like old times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:18.439
    | text      = The Supreme Court had to say that the results of the election are thrown out because it's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:22.600
    | text      = bullshit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:23.600
    | text      = Right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:24.600
    | text      = Now, here's what I find fascinating about that comparatively is that if you hear the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:30.359
    | text      = arguments at the Supreme Court for keeping Trump on the ballot, the Supreme Court justices
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:34.380
    | text      = are all like, hey, listen, if we stop this, you don't know what's going to happen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:39.939
    | text      = Anybody could get fucking thrown off the ballot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:42.079
    | text      = You know what I'm saying?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:43.079
    | text      = If you fuck with me, you know, like that kind of thing, and it is in essence, if Ukraine
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:47.239
    | text      = was like, well, we would throw out the results of these elections, but we're worried people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:52.920
    | text      = will be mad and then throw out the results of that election next time, you know?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:58.199
    | text      = So we'll not do our job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:59.960
